remarks: Technical lemma for ~ bnj69 .  This lemma may no longer be used or have become an indirect lemma of the theorem in question (i.e. a lemma of a lemma... of the theorem).  (Contributed by Jonathan Ben-Naim, 3-Jun-2011.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
bnj1121.1 $e |- ( th <-> ( R _FrSe A /\ X e. A ) ) $.
bnj1121.2 $e |- ( ta <-> ( B e. _V /\ _TrFo ( B , A , R ) /\ _pred ( X , A , R ) C_ B ) ) $.
bnj1121.3 $e |- ( ch <-> ( n e. D /\ f Fn n /\ ph /\ ps ) ) $.
bnj1121.4 $e |- ( ze <-> ( i e. n /\ z e. ( f ` i ) ) ) $.
bnj1121.5 $e |- ( et <-> ( ( f e. K /\ i e. dom f ) -> ( f ` i ) C_ B ) ) $.
bnj1121.6 $e |- ( ( th /\ ta /\ ch /\ ze ) -> A. i e. n et ) $.
bnj1121.7 $e |- K = { f | E. n e. D ( f Fn n /\ ph /\ ps ) } $.
bnj1121 $p |- ( ( th /\ ta /\ ch /\ ze ) -> z e. B ) $.
